summary: Devil Chicken from Hell Mod... cash
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=red][b][size=+2][center]Devil Chicken From Hell Mod[/center][/color][/b][/size]

[center][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111227201229/jarssecretbase/images/6/6a/Skyrim_logo.png[/img][/center]

[center][b]This is a Retexture Mod for Skyrim that replaces the chicken with an Evel Death Chicken that came straight from Hell. I Also added some Evil Sounds!!!111[/center][/b]

[center][youtube]wXyW1B_nkro[/youtube][/center]

[size=+1][b][center][color=lightblue][u]Installation[/u][/color][/center][/b][/size]

- Unpack the Zip file on your Computer
- Move/Copy the \"textures\" and \"sounds\" Folder into your Skyrim Data Folder (\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\)
- Start the Game!

Note: If the \"textures\" and \"sounds\" Folder already exists -> Copy the \"chicken\" folder into the textures Folder.

[center][b]_______________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/center]

[center][b]I Hope you like this little Mod.

If you want to help me with this project message me and ill add you in Steam! Or just suggest your ideas in the comment box.[/b][/center]

[right]This Mod has been created by chaingame32[/font][/right]

[center][b]_______________________________________________________________________________________[/b][/center]

[size=+1][b][center][color=lightblue][u]Updates[/u][/color][/center][/b][/size]

[b]NEW: Version 1.1:
- The Chicken now makes Evil Sounds![/b]

Version 1.0: 
- Retextured the Chicken to a Evil Killer Chicken from deep Hell
author: chaingame32
